name: Melody
description: '''Melodía Ruiz Gutiérrez''' (born 12 October 1990), best known by her stage name '''Melody''', is a Spanish singer, songwriter, dancer, actress and model. Melody became famous at the age of 10 with her song "{{lang|es|[[El baile del gorila]]|i=no}}", one of the biggest [[summer hit]]s of 2001 in Spain. She has released six albums and numerous successful singles in the Spanish and Latin American markets. She represented {{esccnty|Spain|y=2025|t=Spain}} at the [[Eurovision Song Contest 2025]] with the song "{{lang|es|[[Esa diva]]|i=no}}", finishing in 24th place overall with 37 points.
